name: House of Memories (gabrielgundes)
description:
House of Memories is a third person horror game where you play as Greg, a 7-year-old boy whose soul got trapped into a ragdoll's body during a search for a friend. Now, you must find your real body and your friend, but be aware, the path will be full of monsters trying to capture you. There is something foul happening in the Rocksfield City. There are monsters everywhere and you can't hide forever.
  • Dive into the dark world of House of Memories to unravel horrific mysteries.
  • Solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of the family Dudley and the whereabouts of your friend, Happy.
  • Use your best skills and creative to outwit your enemies.

Follow me on Twitter to keep update about the game

Details about the demo:
  • Lenght: 30-45 min
  • Language: English, Português-Brasil (Deutsch and Español coming next week)
  • Press kit: https://houseofmemoriesgame.com/presskit
  • Developer: solo developer
